org.apache.logging.log4j.core.filter

    public interface Filterable
extends LifeCycle
    Interface implemented by Classes that allow filtering to occur.

    Extends LifeCycle since filters have a life cycle.

    • 嵌套类概要

      • 从接口继承的嵌套类/接口 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LifeCycle

        LifeCycle.State

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void addFilter(Filter filter)
      Adds a new Filter.
      Filter getFilter()
      Returns an Iterator for all the Filters.
      boolean hasFilter()
      Determine if a Filter is present.
      boolean isFiltered(LogEvent event)
      Determines if the event should be filtered.
      void removeFilter(Filter filter)
      Removes a Filter.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.logging.log4j.core.LifeCycle

        getState, initialize, isStarted, isStopped, start, stop

    • 方法详细资料

      • addFilter

        void addFilter(Filter filter)
        Adds a new Filter. If a Filter already exists it is converted to a CompositeFilter.
        参数:
        filter - The Filter to add.

      • removeFilter

        void removeFilter(Filter filter)
        Removes a Filter.
        参数:
        filter - The Filter to remove.

      • getFilter

        Filter getFilter()
        Returns an Iterator for all the Filters.
        返回:
        an Iterator for all the Filters.

      • hasFilter

        boolean hasFilter()
        Determine if a Filter is present.
        返回:
        true if a Filter is present, false otherwise.

      • isFiltered

        boolean isFiltered(LogEvent event)
        Determines if the event should be filtered.
        参数:
        event - The LogEvent.
        返回:
        true if the event should be filtered, false otherwise.
